channel.title: Need ::master help
channel.description: Ok on my server there is ::master for character rights 2 or higher and it works but.. if sets your stats at 117.. and you can do it more then once. Can anyone help me and tell me how to set it so you get 99 and can only do ::master 1 time?

item.title: Need ::master help
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

if durial’s doesn’t work you can use mine:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) {
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
addSkillXP(14000000, i);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Need ::master help
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Try setting it like this…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("" + playerName + " .. YOU ARE A MASTER!."); }

But see where the “486000000” is? Change that to the amount of EXP you want to give. This should only work once. I’m not sure how much EXP you need for lvl 117, but you can work that out

Hope this helps,

Durial12

Read full topic
